63.4.clarification: NOTE: The matrix D shape in the docstring is incorrectly stated as (N_t-2) x (N_t-2). The correct shape is (N_p-2) x (N_p-2), matching the output from construct_matrix. D operates on the price dimension (interior points), not the time dimension.
63.4.corrected_docstring_line: D: The tri-diagonal matrix constructed for the finite difference method. Shape: (N_p-2) x (N_p-2) (float)
